jd: From: Mike Smith, Anveta INC mike@anveta.com Reply to: mike@anveta.com Hi,I came across your resume on one of the online job boards. Anveta is an IT Staffing and consulting company headquartered in TX and have been in business for over 20 years. We help several Fortune 500 companies staff their technical roles. Your profile looks like a good match for a role I currently have open. If you are interested, please revert with an updated resume. If this isn’t the right match for you, I apologize and feel free to forward it to any of your friends who might be interested. Title: Sr. .Net Developer Location: RemoteDuration: 6+ Months TMW System (Routes & Trips) experience mandatory Job Description:Sr. .Net Developer with 10 years of experience in design and develop distributed systems.Should have strong experience on TMW System experience in SCM.Experience working on and deliver large-scale, globally distributed systems, with application of Design Patterns, Test Driven Development and continuous integration etc.Must be able to work from Front end to Backend development with C#, .Net Core technologies.UI Development experience with JavaScript, Angular and Node JS/ React JS.Should have experience working on Azure.Deep understanding of web services including Rest API and Micro Services development.Experience with cross-platform messaging environments.Experience with SQL Server database programming skills include SQL and PL/SQL.Good understanding with API gateway and No SQL Database. Thanks and Regards,Mike SmithSr Technical RecruiterAnveta, Inc.1333 Corporate Drive, Suite #108Irving, TX 75038E-Mail: mike@anveta.com Website: http://www.anveta.com
